page.title: 19SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: In this area there is no real poverty. The majority of pensioners are past employees of the Duchy of Cornwall and live in Duchy cottages near to families.Property owners are mostly here because of existing ties.There are Council houses at Venterdon for the slightly infirm or aged with an attendant warden.The people's own good health and a caring communityhas, so far, prevented too many problems in spite of the fact that Health facilities are 5 miles away.However, great concern is being expresed at the number of young people departing to nearby towns through lack of employment,and that some newcomers are taking little part in the community, their interests lying elsewhere. Increased traffic causes problems and public opinion has caused a students' hostel to be resited.
